info.title: AXtension Content Gate
info.description: Create a single point of truth for the content in your organization across Microsoft Dynamics 365 apps, by having all relevant content displayed in one overview, in one click.

businessEntityId.description: The id of the business entity that the requirement was attached to.

get.description: Executes a query on an AXtension Content Gate environment.

parameters.name: providerReferenceId
parameters.description: The business entity provider reference id.

MimeType.description: The mime type of the file.

PageCount.description: The number of pages. If unknown -1 will be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the content item.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode in which the content should be loaded. Leave empty to get the original file.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context in which the content should be downloaded. Preview-first-page only works if previewer caching is enabled.
